fields.description:
The bedside tables put everything you need at your fingertips while lying in your bed. A glass of water, a novel for evening reading or an alarm clock. Keep them conveniently close to the bedside table.

A small bedside table is the perfect choice if you just need a place for your cell phone. If you need enough space for a night light, candles, plants, or other decorative items, you may want to look at larger bedside tables with a larger surface area. Some bedside tables even have storage space on the lower shelf. The cabinet-style bedside table has small cabinets or drawers where you can keep accessories out of sight.

Whether your style is traditional or modern, bold or minimalist - in the IKEA range you will find a bedside table that complements your bed .
fields.title: The bedside table watches next to you
